summary: Advanced Style examines the lives of seven unique New Yorkers whose eclectic personal style and vital spirit have guided their approach to aging.
cast: Iris Apfel|Joyce Carpati|Ari Cohen|Lynn Dell|Pamela Deutsch|Simon Doonan|Zelda Kaplan|Ricki Lake|Jane Latman|Jacquie Murdock|Debra Rapoport|Tziporah Salamon|Stan Satlin|Ilona Smithkin|Anna Snead|Marilyn Sokol|Dita Von Teese
title: Advanced Style
